titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Queens County Courthouse subpoena record 1977.448
titlestmt.author: Matthew Gorham
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection was processed and described as part of the project, "Uncovering the Secrets of Brooklyn's 19th Century Past: Creation to Consolidation," funded by the Council on Library and Information Resources, with additional support from The Gladys Krieble Delmas Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2023-08-21 11:09:34 +0000.

did.abstract: A subpoena record requesting the presence of the person listed (the name is largely illegible) to act as a witness in a case held at the Queens County Courthouse in Jamaica, Queens. The creator of this document is unknown.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Source and date of acquisition unknown. The item was formally accessioned in 1977.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date (if known); Queens County Courthouse subpoena record, 1977.448, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Historical Society.

controlaccess.genreform: Court records |z New York (State) |z Queens County
